title: Bonus: Lazy Geniusing a Morning Routine with Erin Moon
itunes:title: Bonus: Lazy Geniusing a Morning Routine with Erin Moon
itunes:subtitle: It’s our final bonus episode, you guys! Over the summer I’m talking to some Internet and IRL friends about Lazy Geniusing an aspect of our every day lives. Today, I’m talking to Erin Moon about morning routines! Helpful Companion Links   You can...
description:
It’s our final bonus episode, you guys! Over the summer I’m talking to some Internet and IRL friends about Lazy Geniusing an aspect of our every day lives. Today, I’m talking to Erin Moon about morning routines!

Helpful Companion Links

  • You can find Erin Moon on Instagram and online here.
  • The Lazy Genius Way is out now! Get your copy today from your favorite bookseller!Erin

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
